metadata.title: CVE-2024-0638 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Least privilege violation in the Checkmk agent plugins mk_oracle,mk_oracle.ps1, and mk_oracle_crs before Checkmk 2.3.0b4 (beta), 2.2.0p24,2.1.0p41 and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows local users to escalate privileges.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
